name: A Tool Called "Ninja"
effect:
Target: (1) 1 of your in-play Ninjas
             (2) 1 of your injured NInjas, except                  (1)
Effect: Send target (1) to your Chakra area to heal target (2).
"Well done, Haku."

name: All Nine Rookies Face Off
effect: Effect: You may deploy an additional Ninja this turn if you have fewer in-play Ninja's than you opponent after deploying 1 Ninja.
"Here we all are, the nine rookies. This is gonna be fun."

name: Anbu
effect:
Leaf | Anbu | Male
[FACELESS EXPERT]
Valid: This Ninja can be put in play even if there is a Ninja with the same name in your Village.
"Fancy meeting you here."

name: Anko Mitarashi
effect:
Leaf | Special Jonin | Female | Proctor| Mental Power: 1
[FORBIDDEN JUTSU]
When this Ninja becomes the user of a Jutsu card, "Water" symbols of the Jutsu cost can be paid by "Lightning" symbols instead.
"Now then, let me just borrow your left hand."

name: Appearance of Unknown Rivals
effect:
Permanent (3)
Effect: Draw 1 card everytime your opponent deploys a Ninja. This effect cannot be duplicated.
"So this is the Chunin exam, huh? ...... It's a freak show."

name: Baiu
effect: Rain | Genin | Male
"The nerve of those brats from the Village of the Sand ..."

name: Beyond the Goal
effect:
Target: All your Ninjas
Effect: When the target's Team wins a Battle Reward during this turn, heal all the Ninjas in the Team.
"If qualities of heaven are your desire, acquire wisdom and knowledge to take your mind higher. If earthly qualities are what you lack, train your body in the fields and prepare to attack."

name: Broken Heart
effect:
Target: Both player's in-play "Permanent" Mission cards
Effect: Send the target to their original owner's Chakra area.
"A weirdo?"

name: Broken Seal
effect:
Permanent
Effect: You can discard 3 cards in your Chakra area at the beginning of your turn. Then, draw 1 card.
"What is this energy?"

name: Chakra Concentration
effect:
Target: (1) 1 Jutsu card in your Chakra                   area
             (2) User
Effect: Discard target (1) and pay its Jutsu cost. Then apply the effect of target (1) to target (2). However, the "Requirements" and "Target" of target (1) must be applicable.
"Focus my chakra ..."

name: Cheating
effect:
Requirements: 1 Ninja with "Mental Power" of 1 or more
Target:User's Team and the Team Battling against the user
Effect: The target performs a Mental Power Battle durng this turn.
"Lee! When you can see it, adjust your headband."

name: Cheating Prevention
effect: Effect: Teams with 2 or less Team Mental Power cannot be sent to Battle this turn.
"Five strikes and your out. You just failed the test."

name: Choji Akimichi
effect:
Leaf | Genin | Male
[FORMATION]
Valid: This Ninja gets +2/+0 when "Ino Yamanaka" and "Shikamaru Nara" are in this Ninja's Team.
"Cho!"

name: Combat in Extreme Conditions
effect: Effect: Move your Turn Marker up by 1. You cannot move the Turn Marker up during your End Phase of the turn you apply this effect.
"Stand up, idiot!"

name: Crow
effect:
Puppet
[PUPPET]
Valid: This Ninja cannot be sent out in a Team without a Ninja with a "Manipulation" Combat Attribute.
"We go with you to make sure you're not up to anything."

name: Curse Mark Jutsu
effect:
Requirements: "Orochimaru"
Target: 1 Ninja Battling against the user
Effect: Make the target your Battle Reward. However, your opponent can negate this effect by discarding 2 of their Battle Rewards to their original owner's Discard Pile.
"I just gave him a little parting gift."

name: Curse Mark Out of Control
effect:
Permanent (3)
Target: 1 Ninja
Effect: The target gets +1/+1. The target's Team cannot win any Battle Rewards. When this card is put in play, place a Ninja Blade coin symbolizing this effect on the target.
"Don't worry. I'm all right. It's only the powers flowing through me."

name: Curse Sealing
effect:
Requirements: "Jonin" or higher Rank
Target: 1 of your opponent's Ninjas
Effect: The target's effect is negated during this turn.
"Just a little longer and it'll be all done."

name: Disguise Jutsu
effect:
Target: Every Ninja in the user's Team
Effect: The target cannot be the target of your opponent's Jutsu cards during this turn.
"Fake rocks? ... What's up with that?"

name: Dosu Kinuta
effect:
Sound | Genin | Male
[SONIC IMPACT]
When this Ninja is the Head Ninja, your opponent's Head Ninja Battling against this Ninja receives 1 Damage after the Showdown.
"If you insult the Sound shinobi, you better be ready for the consequences."

name: Dreadful Scars
effect:
Permanent (2)
Effect: All Ninja's are deployed in injured status.
"Man, what a mess. Scars and puncture wounds. Burn marks ... What he must have endured."

name: Earth Scroll
effect:
Permanent
Effect: You may discard this card and your "Heaven Scroll" Mission card at the beginning of your turn (both cards must be in play when you discard them). Then, draw 2 cards.
"We really lucked out ... The first people to fall into the trap we set were carrying the Earth Scroll we needed!"

name: Endless Path Jutsu
effect:
Requirements: "Genjutsu" Combat Attribute
Target: 1 of your opponent's Non-Battling Teams
Effect: The target cannot win any Battle Rewards this turn.
"We've been very, very cautiously ...... running around in circles!"

name: Evil Illusion: Misleading Jutsu
effect:
Requirements: "Proctor"
Target: All Teams with 0 or less Team Mental Power
Effect: The target's Ninja's become Stand-By Ninjas.
"Why don't you just give up now, before you get hurt?"

name: Examination Rule
effect:
Permanent
Effect: All Teams of only 1 "Chunin" lower Rank Ninja cannot win any Battle Rewards.
"You see, only groups of three are allowed to apply for and take the exam."

name: Face Stealing Jutsu
effect:
Target: User
Effect: Select 1 of your Ninja's in your hand and send it to your Chakra area. The target's Power is changed to the same value as the selected Ninja during this turn.
"There's nothing where their faces used to be, like they melted or something."

name: Fire Style: Dragon Flame Jutsu
effect:
Requirements: "Sharingan Eye"
Target: 1 of the Ninjas Battling against user
Effect: Give 2 Damage to the target. When the target is "Jonin" or higher rank, give 1 Damage.

name: Fire Style: Phoenix Flower Jutsu
effect:
Target: Every Ninja Battling against the user
Effect: Flip a Ninja Blade coin for each target; if it's heads, give 1 Damage to the Ninja.
"Fire Style! Phoenix Flower Jutsu!"

name: First Chunin Exam
effect:
Permanent (2)
Effect: All Teams perform a Mental Power Battle.
"Now, if we are ready we'll proceed to the first stage of the Chunin exam."

name: Forbidden Technique
effect: Effect: Select 1 symbol. Jutsu cards with the selected symbol cannot be used during this turn.
"Lee! ... That last technique is forbidden, you know that!"

name: Formation Ino-Shika-Cho
effect:
Requirements: "Ino Yamanaka", "Shikamaru Nara", and "Coji Akimichi"
Target: Every Ninja in user's Team
Effect: The target can use Jutsu cards with "Requirements: 'Mind' Combat Attribute", "Requirements: 'Shadow' Combat Attribute", and "Requirements: 'Food' Combat Attribute" without paying their Jutsu costs during this turn.
"Okay, Team Ino, let's show these guys who's boss."

name: Gaara of the Desert
effect:
Sand | Genin | Male
[AUTO GUARD]
Valid: If this Ninja receives Damage, reduce the Damage by 1. Then, discard 1 of your in-play Ninjas (except this Ninja).
"Shut up! ... or I'll kill you!"

name: Gato
effect:
Land of Waves | President | Male

"I put out big money for you ... Because your supposed to be hot-shot assassins!"

name: Genjutsu
effect:
Requirements: "Chunin" or higher Rank
Target: 1 of your opponent's "Genin" Ninjas
Effect: Move the target back to its original owner's hand. However your opponent can negate this efect by discarding 1 card from their hand.
"That's how you'll end up if you take the chunin exams."

name: Giant Shuriken
effect:
Target: (1) User's Team
             (2) Every Back Ninja Battling                   against the user.

name: Giant Snake
effect:
Sound | Snake
[MONSTROSITY]
Valid: This Ninja cannot be the user of a Jutsu card.
Valid: When this Ninja is discarded after being in play, it is sent to the bottom of your Deck instead of the Discard Pile.
"Hssss"

name: Heaven Scroll
effect:
Permanent
Effect: You can discard this card and your "Earth Scroll" Mission card at the beginning of your turn (both cards must be in play when your discard them). Then, get 2 Battle Rewards.
"Lucky us ... We needed the Heaven Scroll."

name: Here Comes Second Test Proctor Anko Mitarashi!
effect: Effect: Both players charge all cards in their hand to their Chakra area and then draw cards until they have 3 cards in their hand.

name: Ibiki Morino
effect:
Leaf | Special Jonin | Male | Proctor | Mental Power: 1
[FIRST PROCTOR]

name: Image of Death
effect:
Counter
Target: Every Ninja

name: Inari
effect:
Land of Waves | Male

name: Ino Yamanaka

Leaf | Genin | Female | Mental Power: 1

Leaf | Chunin | Male | Mental Power: 1

Leaf | Chunin | Male | Proctor | Mental Power: 1

Leaf | Genin | Male | Mental Power: 2

Rain | Genin | Male

Leaf | Jonin | Male | Sharingan Eye

Land of Fire | Feudal Lord's Wife | Female

name: Moegi

Leaf | Ninja Academy Student | Female

Rain | Genin | Male

Leaf | Genin | Male | Mental Power: -1

name: Naruto Uzumaki

Leaf | Genin | Male | Clone Status

name: Naruto Uzumaki

Counter

effect:
Rain | Genin | Male

Sound | Sannin | Male | Mental Power: 3

name: Pass Permit

name: Preliminary Examination

Permanent

name: Promise from the Past
effect: Effect: Look at the top 5 cards of your Deck. If there are 1 or more "Female" Ninjas among the cards, select 1 "Female" Ninja of your choice, show it to your opponent and place it in your hand. Then, return the rest of your Deck and shuffle it.
"This is Sakura."

name: Puppet Master Jutsu
effect:
Requirements: "Manipulation" Combat Attribute

name: Revive, Sharingan!
effect: Effect: Discard all cards in your hand (unless there are none). Then, search for 1 Ninja with "Sharingan Eye" in your Deck and show it to your opponent. Then, place it in your hand and shuffle your Deck.

name: Sakura Haruno
effect: Leaf | Genin | Female | Mental Power: 3

effect:
Leaf | Genin | Female | Mental Power: 3

effect:

name: Sand Coffin
effect:
Requirements: "Sand" Combat Attribute

effect:

Leaf | Genin | Male | Sharingan Eye

effect:
Leaf | Genin | Male | Sharingan Eye

name: Sasuke Uchiha
effect:
Leaf | Genin | Male | Sharingan Eye

During the Exchange of Jutsu, you can move 1 of your Battle Rewards to its original owner's Chakra area. Then, this Ninja gets +2/+0 during this turn.

name: Securing Food
effect:
Permanent (1)

name: Senbon
effect:
Target: 1 Ninja

effect:

Permanent (3)

name: Tazuna
effect:
Land of Waves | Master | Male
Effect: If your opponent wins 3 or more Battle Rewards in a turn, discard the Battle Rewards so they win only 3 Battle Rewards.
"I'm building a bridge there that will change our world! I expect you to get me there safely even if it means giving up your life!"

name: Temari
effect:
Sand | Genin | Female | Mental Power: 1
[VIOLENT TEMPER]
If 1 of your opponent's Ninjas is injured by the Attack of this Ninja's Team, your opponent must select 1 of the of the cards in their hand and discard it.
"Fine ... I'm not involved in any of this, okay?"

name: The End of the Demon
effect:
Target: (1) 1 of your "Chunin" or higher                   Rank Ninjas with a "Water"                   symbol
             (2) 1 of your opponent's Ninjas or                   Clients
Effect: Discard the target.
"He ... he's the d-devil!"

name: The Fastest Ones
effect:
Permanent
Effect: You win the game when you win a total of 9 Battle Rewards instead of 10. This effect cannot be applied to your opponent. This card cannot be played if you have 5 or more Battle Rewards.
"In just 97 minutes ... This is unprecedented!"

name: The Third Eye
effect:
Requirements: "Sand" Combat Attribute
Target: User
Effect: The target gets "Mental Power" + X during this turn. X = the number of cards in your opponent's hand.
"The opening of the third eye!"

name: The Third Hokage
effect:
Leaf | Village Leader | Male | Mental Power: 3
[BEGINNING OF THE CHUNIN EXAM]
When this Ninja is put in play, both players must discard in-play Ninjas until each player's total number of "Genin" and no Rank Ninjas is 3 or less.
"Are there any in your squads you'd recommend? Who are ready for the exams despite their inexperience?"

name: Tonbo Tobitake
effect: Leaf | Chunin | Male | Proctor | Mental Power: 1
"We're the best of the best, and you, my friend, are history."

name: Tortoise Ninja
effect:
Leaf | Tortoise Ninja
[MASTER?]
When this Ninja is put in play, you can move 1 Jutsu Card with "Requirements: 'Taijutsu' Combat Attribute" from your Chakra area to you hand.
"All right then please come out, Guy Sensei."

name: Twin Snake Sacrifice Jutsu
effect:
Requirements: "Special Jonin" or higher Rank
Target: User and 1 Ninja Battling against the user
Effect: Discard the Target.
"Right ... It's over. You and I are going to die here ..."

name: Udon
effect:
Leaf | Ninja Academy Student | Male | Mental Power: 1
[FEATURE ARTICLE]
When this Ninja is put in play, show the top card of your deck to your opponent. If it is a Jutsu card, place it in your hand.
"Call me Udon!"

name: Waraji
effect:
Land of Fire | Samurai | Male
Effect: If you win 3 or more Battle Rewards in a turn, give 1 Damage to 1 of your opponent's Ninja.
"What a waste ... I was in the mood to cut something."

name: Weeding
effect: Effect: Each player sends 1 or 2 cards (their choice) from the top of their Deck to their original owner's Chakra area.
"I got rid of all weeds! Pretty cool, huh?"

name: Wind Scythe Jutsu
effect:
Target: 1 Jutsu card being played by your opponent
Effect: Negate the target and move it into your opponents chakra area. However, your opponent can negate this effect by discarding two cards in their chakra area.
"Wind Scythe Justu!"

name: Wind Style: Great Breakthrough
effect:
Requirements: "Jonin" or higher Rank
Target: Every Ninja
Effect: Move the target back to its original owner's hand.
"Yaaaaah!!"

name: Windmill
effect:
Target: 1 Jutsu card being played
Effect: When the target is played and moved to the Chakra area, it is immediately moved back to its original owner's hand.
"A'right, that's enough ... Lee!"

name: Written Test
effect: Effect: All Teams perform a Mental Power Battle during this turn.
"Not a written test, no waaaay!!"

name: Zaku Abumi
effect:
Sound | Genin | Male
[WIND PRESSURE]
When your opponent's Ninja with a "Weapon" Combat Attribute is Battling against this Ninja, it gets -1/-1 during this turn.
"You heard what he said about the Hidden Sound Village? He called us little."

name: Zori
effect:
Land of Fire | Samurai | Male
Effect: If you win 3 or more Battle Rewards in a turn, give 1 Damage to 1 of your opponent's Ninja.
"Too bad ... You'll have to come with us. Now."
